column3: Things can't stay as they are. There is a need {{c1::for}} change.
When we were in New York, we had a map {{c1::of}} the subway system.
There is a lot of debate about the causes {{c1::of}} climate change.
Everything can be explained. There's a reason {{c1::for}} everything.
The show is very popular, and there has been a great demand {{c1::for}} tickets.
Jane showed me some photos {{c1::of}} the city as it looked 100 years ago.
